name: After School Ghost Club
description:
Controls: AWSD/Movment Space bar/Dodging Mouse/Attacking Explore a haunted school!
  • In this top-down shooter you join the Supernatural Investigation Club, and equiped only with your trusty Ectoflash Camera you enter a abandoned school!
  • Complete missions, each one being a set of rooms with different objectives.
  • Contains 5 missions in this protorype.

This project is a prototype and proof of concept, it is not finished.

Feedback is appreciated.
